body.p: John's parents are concerned because John is changing majors for the second time. John claims this is not unusual. Using the mean and standard deviation given above, is John's behavior unusual?

explanation.p: Since the mean is 1.23 and the standard deviation is 1.08, two changes is less than 1 standard deviation above the mean.
So, John's behavior is not unusual at all. In fact, it is quite ordinary.
